original_text: He went away again across the Jordan to the place where John had been baptizing at first, and there he remained.
korean_text: 다시 요단 강 저편 요한이 처음으로 세례 베풀던 곳에 가사 거기 거하시니

sentences.original_text: He went away again across the Jordan
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 다시 요단 강 건너편으로 떠나갔습니다

sentences.original_text: to the place where John had been baptizing at first
